Move Drive files to or from trash

Source: R/drive_trash.R
drive_trash.Rd

Move Drive files to or from trash

Usage

drive_trash(file, verbose = deprecated())

drive_untrash(file, verbose = deprecated())

Arguments

file

Something that identifies the file(s) of interest on your Google Drive. Can be a character vector of names/paths, a character vector of file ids or URLs marked with as_id(), or a dribble.

verbose

This logical argument to individual googledrive functions is deprecated. To globally suppress googledrive messaging, use options(googledrive_quiet = TRUE) (the default behaviour is to emit informational messages). To suppress messaging in a more limited way, use the helpers local_drive_quiet() or with_drive_quiet().

Value

An object of class dribble, a tibble with one row per file.

Examples

# Create a file and put it in the trash.
file <- drive_example_remote("chicken.txt") %>%
  drive_cp("chicken-trash.txt")
#> Original file:
#> • chicken.txt <id: 1wOLeWVRkTb6lDmLRiOhg9iKM7DlN762Y>
#> Copied to file:
#> • chicken-trash.txt <id: 18wVo3LXNMxr7ig_hX-Zq3ukGsc7LixZo>
drive_trash("chicken-trash.txt")
#> File trashed:
#> • chicken-trash.txt <id: 18wVo3LXNMxr7ig_hX-Zq3ukGsc7LixZo>

# Confirm it's in the trash
drive_find(trashed = TRUE)
#> # A dribble: 96 × 3
#>    name                 id                                drive_resource
#>    <chr>                <drv_id>                          <list>        
#>  1 chicken-trash.txt    18wVo3LXNMxr7ig_hX-Zq3ukGsc7LixZo <named list>  
#>  2 name-squatter-rename 18DY5CMozhLPt47IJwj4taiXA3g_F7jBH <named list>  
#>  3 name-squatter-mv     1da6gILR6iK-Ku9AEBXXzpeur1h7502xs <named list>  
#>  4 name-squatter-upload 1Zl_Vjic-3xzZlFF0nyuQTvUJUVyeHSk- <named list>  
#>  5 name-squatter-rename 1VEhy94AiZyW23eEFee86D3AI1YG9-4dB <named list>  
#>  6 name-squatter-mv     1zSsrejqp0Q0o3YvV6PffNOMCS4arAc3I <named list>  
#>  7 name-squatter-upload 1l8LiHhooekngogIn6EAf56swckcOGca2 <named list>  
#>  8 name-squatter-rename 1yXkku9j7onqYIPs2NY-oedR1U1eDp-pQ <named list>  
#>  9 name-squatter-mv     1AaNN9AQdnwF3iu4OIm332gl8kTo7jE6c <named list>  
#> 10 name-squatter-upload 1d_t1EXQf5e_eFfO9BlYdRNlLK8HH4ryt <named list>  
#> # ℹ 86 more rows

# Remove it from the trash and confirm
drive_untrash("chicken-trash.txt")
#> File untrashed:
#> • chicken-trash.txt <id: 18wVo3LXNMxr7ig_hX-Zq3ukGsc7LixZo>
drive_find(trashed = TRUE)
#> # A dribble: 95 × 3
#>    name                 id                                drive_resource
#>    <chr>                <drv_id>                          <list>        
#>  1 name-squatter-rename 18DY5CMozhLPt47IJwj4taiXA3g_F7jBH <named list>  
#>  2 name-squatter-mv     1da6gILR6iK-Ku9AEBXXzpeur1h7502xs <named list>  
#>  3 name-squatter-upload 1Zl_Vjic-3xzZlFF0nyuQTvUJUVyeHSk- <named list>  
#>  4 name-squatter-rename 1VEhy94AiZyW23eEFee86D3AI1YG9-4dB <named list>  
#>  5 name-squatter-mv     1zSsrejqp0Q0o3YvV6PffNOMCS4arAc3I <named list>  
#>  6 name-squatter-upload 1l8LiHhooekngogIn6EAf56swckcOGca2 <named list>  
#>  7 name-squatter-rename 1yXkku9j7onqYIPs2NY-oedR1U1eDp-pQ <named list>  
#>  8 name-squatter-mv     1AaNN9AQdnwF3iu4OIm332gl8kTo7jE6c <named list>  
#>  9 name-squatter-upload 1d_t1EXQf5e_eFfO9BlYdRNlLK8HH4ryt <named list>  
#> 10 name-squatter-rename 16lgbs4QQDSGXvnkDakakEdlkQMvyXJzy <named list>  
#> # ℹ 85 more rows

# Clean up
drive_rm("chicken-trash.txt")
#> File deleted:
#> • chicken-trash.txt <id: 18wVo3LXNMxr7ig_hX-Zq3ukGsc7LixZo>
